sub_title: Senior Manager, Technical Support EMEA at Snowflake
summary:
Abhishek Saxena is an experienced IT executive with over 17 years in the industry. In his current role at Snowflake, he leads the SQL Technical Support team in EMEA which is providing support to customers worldwide. 

He has worked in Avaya for approximately seven years, Veritas Technologies for approximately six years and ServiceNow for three years. Apart from his native country India, where he’s been based out of Delhi and Pune, he’s working in Netherlands providing him the necessary global exposure.

His core strengths are in Customer Support, Strategy, Execution, Services, P&L management, Operational excellence, developing talent, whether it was building large teams, overachieving services targets consistently or managing through change.

education.field_of_study: AISSE & AISSCE, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics & Computer Science

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading a team of engineers in EMEA supporting the User Experience SME group of ServiceNow 
•	Responsible for People Management, productivity, employee morale, resource allocation and utilization, team motivation and skills training.
•	Evaluation of current processes, technology, and organizational skills to identify areas of improvement and opportunities for advancement.
•	Execute against company and department’s vision, mission and values.
•	Manage Customer Support experience, drive Continuous Service Improvements thereby drive increased Customer Satisfaction
•	Manage OKRs and critical support metrics that defines the overall Customer Satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Manager, Technical Support

profile_positions.description:
• End to End responsibility of FTE’s performance and people management 
• FTE’s responsible for providing technical support (Frontline and backline included) for VCS,VxVM, VOM, Data Insight, Storage Foundation and VERITAS Products etc. 
• Manage and integrate a wide variety of technical services within one center to provide support to a designated customer population within defined geographical regions. 
• Business: Work with staff, vendors, customers, and internal/external experts to improve processes and standards. Ensures all regulatory and security standards are maintained. Introduce new technology and process improvement strategies, with an understanding of past/present computing environments. 
• People: Hire, train, motivate, manage, and develops both supervisory and non-supervisory employees. Develop and maintain communications with staff, customer, vendors, and management and represent company at conferences sharing best practices and standards. 
• Financial: Develop and implement monthly/annual operational budgets, forecasts, and business plans to ensure proper planning for impacts of marketing efforts, outages, service level agreements, and other issues. Ensure customer commitments, satisfaction, quality, schedule, and performance goals are met 
• Single point of contact for escalation requests submitted by or on behalf of Partners and Customers across all contract levels (Basic, Essential, and Business Critical Customers) 
• Managing Operations for a team of 35 offshore and 21 onsite FTE’s and branched out Backline and Engineering Team 
• Customer: Work with customer to enhance delivery of service through effective monitoring of programs, process improvement, and problem prevention/resolution initiatives. Ensure satisfaction through implementation of standards/policies needed to fulfill service level expectations. Maintain strong customer relationships through regular communications.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Lead and manage the Backbone Support Functions. The Team provides Tier - III technical support to all Avaya Solutions such as Avaya Messaging, Avaya Aura, Avaya Session Manager at customer premises all over the globe from 2 locations within India (Pune & Hyderabad). 
• The Profile includes Managing the day to day operation, Escalation Management; Monitor and Manage the SLAs, Metrics and performance (Productivity and Workload Share), Ensuring CSAT, Conflict Management, development and engagement of the team. Quality Management, Risk Management, Mitigate and avoid Attrition. Conduct progress meetings with Leadership, Metrics Reporting, and Succession planning and employee development are the key KPIs. 
• Liaison with peers across regions, Global Leaders, Implement the organizational Policies and guidelines, Ensure Ethics & legal compliance, Implementation and Monitoring of the organization’s Mission and Vision via measurable, achievable Goals and Objectives. 
• Disseminate the communication, strive for continuous process compliance and improvement, drive enhancements to ensure efficient delivery, Perform Capacity management, scheduling & appropriate staffing. Drive internal improvement Projects to keep up the motivation and provide opportunities to enhance the overall capability of every individual. 
• Find and seek opportunities on improving the RRR exceptions, drive consensus within and across the teams. 
• Inspire & motivate engineers to deliver on the business KPIs. Manage their Aspirations, ensure the development and growth and control the attrition. Create Growth opportunity for the team members; Mentor the Team Members to achieve their career Aspirations. 
• Directing, leading & motivating workforce and imparting continuous on job training for accomplishing greater operational effectiveness/ efficiency. 
• Successfully built MM Dalian China & new hires in the team on Project basis as a Team leader. Then transitioned these teams to Operations.
profile_positions.title: Principal Software Engineer
